summary: Encapsulates a MONAI algorithm as a set of bundle configurations and scripts, enabling generation of a complete bundle from a template directory by populating placeholders, configuring data statistics and source, integrating with experimentâ€‘tracking, and offering utilities for training, inference, scoring and exporting the bundle to disk.
business_intent: Automate the creation, configuration, training and deployment of reproducible medical imaging segmentation pipelines using MONAI bundles, while supporting experiment tracking and easy distribution.
